definition: the act of tearing, fill with tears or shed tears
details:
noun
- the act of tearing
= example: the act of tearing
- an occasion for excessive eating or drinking
= synonyms: bust, binge, bout
- a drop of the clear salty saline solution secreted by the lacrimal glands
= example: a drop of the clear salty saline solution secreted by the lacrimal glands
= synonyms: teardrop
- an opening made forcibly as by pulling apart
= synonyms: rent, rip, split, snag
verb
- fill with tears or shed tears
= example: fill with tears or shed tears
- strip of feathers
= synonyms: pluck
- to separate or be separated by force
- separate or cause to separate abruptly
= synonyms: snap
- move quickly and violently
= synonyms: shoot
